subject: Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Hideki Kuroda will bring his straight-laced, straight-man countenance to the mound Sunday night, when he will try to help the Dodgers get out of their 2-0 hole against the Phillies.
snippet: Hideki Kuroda will bring his straight-laced, straight-man countenance to the mound Sunday night, when he will try to help the Dodgers get out of their 2-0 hole against the Phillies.
